body:
So hey guys its me and I want to host a small UHC. Add me on skype for the IP as I cannot post it here. This is my first time doing it therefore it will probably be messed up. Please don't hate me just tell me what I can do next time. Add my skype @IzMeRekt for the IP
ADD MY SKYPE FOR IP

Rules

-No hacking
-No excessive spam and swearing


Yeah thats all I can think of right now.

THE GAME IS STARTING ONCE WE HIT 15 PEOPLE

Ip: (Will only post it if a mod allows me)
